vulnerabilities.title: @ianwalter/merge Prototype Pollution via `merge` function
vulnerabilities.description: All versions of package @ianwalter/merge are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution via the main (`merge`) function. @ianwalter/merge is [deprecated](https://github.com/ianwalter/merge/blob/master/README.md) and the maintainer suggests using [@generates/merger](https://github.com/generates/generates/tree/main/packages/merger) instead.
